#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main(){
    int N, i;
    long long int temp, a;
    scanf("%d", &N);
    vector<long long int>x;
    for(i=0; i<N; i++){
        scanf("%lld", &a);
        x.push_back(a);
    }
    long long int count1=0;
    while(x.size()>0){
        temp = *min_element(x.begin(), x.end());
        for(i=0; i<x.size(); i++){
            x[i]-=temp;
            count1++;
            if(x[i]==0) {
                //count1--;
                x.erase(x.begin()+i);
                i--;
            }
        }
        //for(i=0; i<x.size(); i++) cout<<"elem"<<x[i]<<endl;
        //cout<<"ddfv "<<x.size()<<endl;
        printf("%lld\n",count1 );
        count1=0;
    }
    //printf("\n");
    x.clear();
}
